SEARCH
Package presentation

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
presentation.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Controller class manages user interactions and coordinates actions between the view and the business logic layers.

    • enterID

      public void enterID(JFrame frame, String msg, int cases)
      Displays the EnterId view based on the message and cases provided.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame in which the view should be displayed.
      msg - The message indicating whether the operation is related to a client or a product.
      cases - The cases indicating the type of operation.

      id - The ID of the client to be retrieved.

      Parameters:

      object - The object to be deleted (ClientBLL or ProductBLL).
